ghost

extends Entity

        public Ghost(int x,
             int y,
             App app,
             GameManager manager,
             processing.core.PImage sprite1,
             processing.core.PImage sprite2)
        Constructor. Sets the amount of frames each sprite will last before switching.
        Parameters:
        x - x pixel coordinate.
        y - y pixel coordinate.
        app - App instance.
        manager - GameManager instance.
        sprite1 - Sprite 1.
        sprite2 - Sprite 2.

    • Method Detail

      • setScatter

        public static void setScatter(boolean b)
        Sets scatter to true or false.
        Parameters:
        b - Sets scatter to this value.

      • goTo

        public void goTo(int[] targetCoords,
                 java.util.List<java.util.List<GameObject>> map)
        Sets the direction of the ghost based on the shortest straight line distance to the target coordinates.
        Parameters:
        targetCoords - Cell coordinates of the target location [y,x].
        map - Current map.

      • closestCorner

        public int[] closestCorner(java.util.List<java.util.List<GameObject>> map)
        Finds the closest corner of the screen to the ghost. Note this function was only used in the milestone submission, it is no longer used.
        Parameters:
        map - Current map.
        Returns:
        Cell coordinates of the closest corner [y,x].

      • distance

        public static double distance(int[] object1,
                              int[] object2)
        Finds the straight line distance between 2 objects.
        Parameters:
        object1 - [y,x] of object1.
        object2 - [y,x] of object2.
        Returns:
        The straight line distance between the 2 objects.

      • shortestDirection

        public int shortestDirection(double[] distances)
        Finds the direction that the ghost should go based on the shortest distance that is not reverse of its current direction. If the only possible direct ion is the reverse of the current direction, then return that.
        Parameters:
        distances - Array of size 4 representing the distance from each direction. If the direction is not possible (wall), then the value is -1.
        Returns:
        Integer representing the direction the ghost should go.

      • getReverseDirection

        public int getReverseDirection()
        Gets the opposite direction of the object's current direction.
        Returns:
        Integer representing direction (1: right, 2: left, 3: down, 4: up).

      • isAtIntersection

        public boolean isAtIntersection(java.util.List<java.util.List<PathBlock>> pathBlocks)
        Checks if the ghost is at an intersection. An intersection is any path that is not a straight line only. A dead end counts as an intersection, as the ghost must change its direction.
        Parameters:
        pathBlocks - 2D list of pathBlocks.
        Returns:
        true if at an intersection, otherwise false.

      • tick

        public void tick(GameManager manager)
        Ghost logic that is performed every frame. Updates coordinates. Depending on the current state of the ghost, it goes to a certain target. Moves the ghost and changes the sprite if it is not in frightened or soda mode.
        Specified by:
        tick in class Entity
        Parameters:
        manager - GameManger instance.

      • getScatter

        public static boolean getScatter()
        Gets the value of scatter boolean.
        Returns:
        scatter.

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget(int[] arr)
        Sets the target of the ghost, given the target's cell coordinates.
        Parameters:
        arr - Cell coordinates of the target location [y,x].

      • getTarget

        public int[] getTarget()
        Gets the cell coordinates of the current target location.
        Returns:
        Cell coordinates.

      • chase

        public abstract void chase()
        Sets and goes to the chase location of the ghost.

      • scatter

        public abstract void scatter()
        Sets and goes to the scatter location of the ghost.

      • frightened

        public void frightened()
        Choses a random neighbouring tile and goes to it. Only goes backward if that is the only choice. Used when the ghost is at an intersection.

      • goToDirection

        public int[] goToDirection(int direction)
        Sets the target of the ghost to be the next tile in the chosen direction
        Parameters:
        direction - int representing direction
        Returns:
        map coordinates of the chosen target.

      • setScatterTarget

        public abstract void setScatterTarget()
        To set the scatter target of the ghost.
